China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 1 月 28 日星期日 16:36:08 GMT 120
US, China to hold meeting on fentanyl precursor chemicals this weekThe first joint meeting of a U.S.-China working group on fentanyl precursor chemicals will be held on Tuesday in Beijing, a senior U.S. official said on Sunday. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 14:14:20 GMT LUWJWEPNBFNMRO5IB62QGUMG2I https://www.reuters.com/world/first-meeting-us-china-working-group-fentanyl-precursor-chemicals-be-held-2024-01-28/Kanishka Singh, Steve Holland世界
China allows Philippines to supply troops at disputed reefThe Chinese coastguard said it had made "temporary special arrangements" to allow the Philippines to deliver supplies to troops at a grounded World War Two-era vessel at a disputed reef. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 13:08:48 GMT QJOFB6IFDFI6FBPCTUZU3EAAGU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-allows-philippines-supply-troops-disputed-reef-2024-01-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
China's MGI Tech, GemPharmatech defend themselves after US bill proposedChina's MGI Tech said on Sunday as an upstream equipment provider in the gene sequencing industry, its business does not involve data collection, after a proposed U.S. Biosecure Act included its name in the bill. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 08:23:48 GMT 4OW6LZGOKNK2ZNWUN4VBM3SIFU https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/chinas-mgi-tech-gempharmatech-defend-themselves-after-us-bill-propose-2024-01-28/Reuters商业医疗保健与制药
Russia’s planned gas pipeline to China faces construction delay, Financial Times reportsMongolian Prime Minister L. Oyun-Erdene said construction of Russia's planned new Power of Siberia-2 gas pipeline to China, which was expected to start this year, may be delayed, the Financial Times reported on Sunday. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 08:08:31 GMT FM3QOCRSZ5OELOQ6BOFJFQGXKY https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/ Russias-planned-gas-pipeline-china-faces-construction-delay-ft-2024-01-28/Reuters市场商品
China securities regulator suspends restricted share lending from MondayChina's securities regulator said on Sunday that it will fully suspend the lending of restricted shares effective from Monday, in policymakers' latest attempt to stabilise the country's stock markets following recent sharp falls. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 07:37:26 GMT KENEXPWLSFK2XPWDSLONRM子玉https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-securities-regulator-suspends-restricted-share-lending-monday-2024-01-28/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
China, Thailand sign mutual visa waiver agreementsThailand and China agreed on Sunday to waive visa requirements for each other's nationals to facilitate travel and tourism between the two countries, hurt by COVID-19. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 05:26:19 GMT ZYRZFOOOWVOS3B4DMG2PIW2XQQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thailand-china-sign-mutual-visa-waiver-agreements-2024-01-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
